name: @yeyafotografia

services.title: Portrait Photographer
services.description: Your Online Image Crafted to Perfection

aboutpara:
I'm Jesica a Venezuelan mom of three with a Portuguese family living in Porto. 

An art enthusiast with a background in business administration and marketing, looking to grow in the world of digital media. 

I take usually photography newborn/baby/family/anniversary/events/street photography/documentary and others!

Passionate to explore the mixture of photography and business in a global context.
